description: Rada uploads raw footage on Council disputes and BCI failures to underground channels, seeking to enlighten citizens about the systemic issues.
Encrypted discussions within activist groups hint at imminent release of damaging footage, fueling excitement and anxiety in underground circles.
The footage leaks online, quickly gaining traction and igniting widespread protests across Stenograd as citizens demand explanations from the Council.
The Council, pressured by public unrest, enters a session to address immediate concerns and factional conflicts over BCI stabilization strategies.
BCI system glitches lead to denial of access to key city services, trapping many citizens and causing significant public inconvenience.
Council factions publicly blame each other for the failures and crisis, with accusations of political manipulation emerging in media reports.
Major protests swell in the city center as thousands gather to demand transparency, presenting a united front against mismanagement.
Amid ongoing protests, a temporary truce is reached by Council factions to collaborate on emergency measures and attempt a rollback to previous BCI models until stability can be achieved.
